name: Create a shared Google Drive folder and send an Email from a ClickUp task
description:
Use this template to automatically create a shared Google Drive folder and send it in an Email to a job applicant who needs to upload his assessment test when a ClickUp task status has changed.

The template works with the following [Airtable base](https://airtable.com/shruEPIPJZVXf2tAY) and its setup assumes the applicant's email address is in the (ClickUp) task's description.
